name: MtachThemUp!
description:
MATCH THEM UP!

Hi!

This is a match 3 game, where you need to match up to three gems in a row to make something happen. On this project the game is a mix of a fight between your player and a enemy that appears and start hitting you. So the main objective is survive the enemies matching gems off different colors. Gems like Blue, Green ,Yellow and Violet Gives you some Buffs like a shield or x2 Dps Boost and the Reds ones will charge your meter attack bar, and when you finally charge that entirely your héroe will attack the enemy! 

CREDITS

Music

Main menu by Cynic Music ( Alex Smith) finded at OpenGameArt.org

Alex smith it is doing a beautifull game named Pixelsphere, check out!

https://pixelsphere.org  

And the page of Cynic music : https://cynicmusic.com

Gameplay in a Youtube Channel is from a Chiptune ( Track 4 and 9 )

Textures

  • Gems: by Cryptogene on GameDevMarket
  • Players & Enemy AdamKlingPixel at his Page https://adamklingpixel.weebly.com/duelyst.html
  • Backgrounds by Nidhoggn at OpenGameArt.org
  • Other assets UI Atanichi at DeviantArt Diablo III fanmade
  • Buttons by StumpyStrust at OpenGameArt.org 

Developed  by Facundo Ponce  | Mail  dev.facundo.ponce@gmail.com
